mods.note: File i*q. 9 V.O. Correspondence regarding diving matters, the rules and regulations formes oy the Bahrain Covernment for Rakhah u. G-affal etc.Si

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File No. E/9 V. O. Correspondence regarding diving matters, the rules and regulations formed by the Bahrain Government for Rakbah and Gaffal etc.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file. Folios 7-8 are file notes.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 9; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 2-8; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains petitions raised by divers from Oman and Kuwait regarding their work in Bahrain. These were sent to the Political Agency, Bahrain.

name.namePart: Adviser to the Government of Bahrain
